docTitle.titlePart:
Gas production potential of fresh
and ensiled sugar beets in biogas
production

front.div:
Gas production potential of plant biomass can be evaluated by means of the parameter "con-
tent of fermentable organic dry matter" (FOM). The aim of this study was to investigate the
potential gas yield from fresh and ensiled sugar beets. In contrast to other plant biomass,
like forage and cereal crops, the gas yield per kg FOM from sugar beets is a varying fi gure. It
strongly depends on the proportion of sucrose which is converted into ethanol by fermentation
during storage in the silo.
front.keyword:
Keywords
Biogas, methane, biogas yield, gas production potential,
fermentable organic matter (FOM), sugar beets, silages
